items.name: utils
items.description: Utility functions for styling and type safety

items.name: accordion
items.description: A collapsible accordion component with multiple variants and ARIA support
items.docs: Use the accordion component to display collapsible content panels with various styling variants

items.name: sidebar
items.description: A responsive sidebar component with storybook integration.
items.docs: Set up the sidebar by importing it into your project and adjusting its props as needed.

items.name: indicator
items.description: A customizable indicator component with different variants

items.name: IconTypes
items.description: Type definitions for icon components

items.name: CloseIcon
items.description: A close icon component

items.name: ClockIcon
items.description: A clock icon component

items.name: LoaderIcon
items.description: A loader icon component

items.name: FileIcon
items.description: A file icon component for document representations

items.name: UploadIcon
items.description: An upload icon component for file upload interactions

items.name: badge
items.description: A customizable badge component with different variants and shapes
items.docs: Use the badge component to highlight or indicate status information

items.name: button
items.description: A customizable button component with different variants, sizes, and icon options
items.docs: Use the button component for user interactions like form submissions and actions

items.name: select
items.description: A select component with support for custom items and scrolling
items.docs: Use the select component for dropdown selections with various options

items.name: calendar
items.description: A calendar component with single, range and multiple date selection
items.docs: Use the calendar component for date picking with single, range, or multiple selection modes

items.name: form
items.description: Form components built using React Hook Form for validation and state management
items.docs: Use these form components to build accessible forms with validation using React Hook Form

items.name: tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it
items.docs: Use tooltips to provide additional information about UI elements on hover or focus

items.name: label
items.description: A form label component with required indicator and tooltip support
items.docs: Use the label component for form inputs with optional and required state indicators

items.name: AsterixIcon
items.description: An asterisk icon component for required indicators

items.name: TooltipIcon
items.description: An information icon component for tooltips

items.name: callout
items.description: A callout component for displaying important information or alerts with custom styling
items.docs: Use the callout component to highlight important information with various styling options

items.name: dropzone
items.description: A file upload dropzone component with drag and drop support
items.docs: Use the dropzone component for file uploads with drag and drop functionality

items.name: TrashIcon
items.description: A trash icon component for deletion actions

items.name: file-input
items.description: A styled file input component with label and description support
items.docs: Use the file input component for a styled file upload field with label and description

items.name: separator
items.description: A horizontal or vertical separator with customizable appearance
items.docs: Use the separator component to visually separate content in a list or group

items.name: popover
items.description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button
items.docs: Use the popover component to display content in a floating panel

items.name: dialog
items.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content
items.docs: Use the dialog component to display content that requires user interaction

items.name: command
items.description: Command menu for keyboard-first interactions
items.docs: Use the command component to create a command menu for your application

items.name: multi-select
items.description: Multi-select component with search, select all, and customizable options
items.docs: Use the multi-select component for selecting multiple options from a list with search functionality

items.name: navbar
items.description: A responsive navigation bar component with logo, menu items, and mobile menu support
items.docs: Use the navbar component to create responsive navigation bars with logo, menu items, and mobile menu support

items.name: scroll-area
items.description: A scrollable area with custom scrollbars
items.docs: Use the scroll area component to add custom scrollbars to your content

items.name: input
items.description: An input component with support for icons and clearable functionality
items.docs: Use the input component for collecting user input in forms

items.name: phone-input
items.description: A phone input component with country selection and formatting
items.docs: Use the phone input component for international phone number input with formatting and validation

items.name: DNDTreeContext
items.description: Context for DND Tree component

items.name: useDNDTree
items.description: Hook for DND Tree component

items.name: dnd-tree
items.description: A drag and drop tree component with support for nested items
items.docs: Use the DND Tree component to create interactive tree structures with drag and drop functionality

items.name: image-gallery
items.description: A responsive image gallery component with overlay support
items.docs: Use the image gallery component to display a collection of images with responsive layout and overlay support

items.name: pill
items.description: A pill component that extends button with toggle state support
items.docs: Use the pill component for filterable or selectable items in a row

items.name: pill-row
items.description: A horizontally scrollable row of pills with navigation buttons
items.docs: Use the pill row component to display a horizontally scrollable list of pills with navigation controls

items.name: radio-group
items.description: A radio group component with form integration support
items.docs: Use the radio group component for single selection options with form integration support

items.name: rating
items.description: A rating component with customizable icons and hover/click interactions
items.docs: Use the rating component to collect user ratings with customizable icons and interactive feedback

items.name: slider
items.description: A slider component with range support and form integration
items.docs: Use the slider component for range selection with form integration support

items.name: social-button
items.description: A social media button component with support for Google, Facebook, and Apple
items.docs: Use the social button component for social media authentication with customizable variants

items.name: video-player
items.description: A video player component with thumbnail support and custom controls
items.docs: Use the video player component for video playback with thumbnail support and custom controls

items.name: PlayIcon
items.description: A play icon component for media controls
items.docs: Use the PlayIcon component for media playback controls

items.name: ComponentsIcon
items.description: A components icon for menu items

items.name: InboxIcon
items.description: An inbox icon for messaging sections

items.name: LifeBuoyIcon
items.description: A lifeBuoy icon for help sections

items.name: LockIcon
items.description: A lock icon for authorization sections

items.name: PieChartIcon
items.description: A pie chart icon for analytics sections

items.name: SettingsIcon
items.description: A settings icon for configuration sections

items.name: ShoppingCartIcon
items.description: A shopping cart icon for ecommerce sections

items.name: WorldIcon
items.description: A world globe icon for language selection

items.name: SudolabsIcon
items.description: Sudolabs logo icons in full and mini versions

items.name: AdjustmentsIcon
items.description: An adjustments icon for settings controls

items.description: Constants used across UI components
